settings.title: Our Process
settings.heading: Learn how Branch can help you set up your space. From design to installation, we take care of everything, every step of the way.
settings.heading_mobile: Learn how Branch can help you set up your space.

settings.title: Meet Branch
settings.way_description: Explore our curated line or book a free design consultation
settings.heading: Meet Branch
settings.description:
Schedule a call with one of our sales experts to discuss how we can best serve your aesthetic, spatial, and logistical needs.

What colors are you looking for? What kind of space are you looking to furnish?

settings.title: Customize Space
settings.way_description: Receive a personalized space plan and a transparent quote
settings.heading: Customize your space
settings.description:
Weâ€™ll send you a customized space plan and quote based on your needs and budget.

Review your plan and we'll work collaboratively to make any adjustments. Finalize your order once every goal is met.

settings.title: Get Furnished
settings.way_description: Let Branch take care of delivery, installation and cleanup
settings.heading: Get Furnished
settings.description: We'll outfit your office on your timeline. We'll provide white-glove delivery, build items on site, and isntall them according to your floorplan. We'll even clean up and recycle packaging after the installation.

settings.title: Relax
settings.way_description: Enjoy industry-leading warranties and flex as your team grows
settings.heading: Relax
settings.description:
Enjoy working in your new office without worrying about upkeep. We offer an industry-leading 10 years of warranty on desks and tables and 5 to 7 years on seating.

For select clients, when you outgrow your space, we'll pick up your furniture, and offer you partial credit for new items.

settings.heading: The Branch Way: our worry-free-4-step process

settings.title: I see a lot of offices in my line of work. Branch sets a new standard in value for office furnishing.
I see a lot of offices in my line of work. Branch sets a new standard in value for office furnishing.

settings.heading: Let us help you bring your vision to reality and create a better place to work.

settings.title: How does Branch get furniture into my building?
settings.text: We'll coordinate with your building management to ensure a timely and effective installation: whether it's booking a freight elevator, carrying furniture upstairs, or delivering after hours, we can do it all.

settings.title: How long does the installation process take?
settings.text: This depends on the size of the project. Usually, small project only take a few hours and medium ones last around a day. Large installations can take upto 2 days.

settings.title: Does Branch handle clean up after an installation process?
settings.text: Yes. Our delivery partners will remove all the packaging so that your office is ready for work right after everything's installed.

settings.title: Who should I contact if I have questions?
settings.text: For any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to our sales team at sales@branchfurniture.com
